description: WakaTime offers automatic time tracking for developers, integrating with code editors and delivering dashboards on coding activity, project progress, and productivity

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_EDITORS
tools.description: Tool to list WakaTime IDE plugins with metadata. Use when you want to discover available IDE integrations and their latest versions.

inputSchema.title: WakatimeGetEditorsRequest

unreleased.title: Unreleased
unreleased.description: Include unreleased IDE plugins in the returned list.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing IDE plugins in WakaTime.

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_GOALS
tools.description: Tool to list a user's goals with progress series and metadata. Use after authenticating the user with read_goals scope.

inputSchema.title: WakatimeGetGoalsRequest

user.title: User
user.description: User identifier; use 'current' for the authenticated user or specify a user ID

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing a user's goals.

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_GOALS_CURRENT
tools.description: Tool to list the current user's goals with progress series and metadata. Use when you need to fetch active goals (requires read_goals scope).

inputSchema.title: GetGoalsCurrentRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for listing the current user's goals. No parameters.

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_INSIGHTS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve an insight for a user over a time range. Use when analyzing user coding metrics after authentication.

inputSchema.title: GetInsightsRequest

user.title: User
user.description: User identifier path segment; use 'current' for the authenticated user or specify a user ID

range.title: Range
range.description: Time range for the insight; either a year (YYYY), a month (YYYY-MM), or one of: last_7_days, last_30_days, last_6_months, last_year, all_time

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Keystroke timeout in seconds for stats; defaults to the user's setting

weekday.title: Weekday
weekday.description: Filter to a specific weekday; only applied when insight_type is 'days'; Accepts 0–6 or weekday name

writes_only.title: Writes Only
writes_only.description: Whether to include only write events in stats; defaults to the user's setting

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to fetch a user insight over a specified time range.

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_INSIGHTS_CURRENT
tools.description: Tool to fetch a coding insight for the current user over a time range. Use when you need summaries like 'projects' or 'best_day' for a specific period. Requires OAuth scope `read_summaries`.

inputSchema.title: GetInsightsCurrentRequest

range.title: Range
range.description: Time range specifier. Either a year (YYYY), a month (YYYY-MM), or one of: last_7_days, last_30_days, last_6_months, last_year, all_time.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Override keystroke timeout in minutes used to calculate stats; defaults to user's setting.

weekday.title: Weekday
weekday.description: Filter for 'days' insight: integer 0-6 or weekday name ('monday'-'sunday').

writes_only.title: Writes Only
writes_only.description: When true, include only write events per user's writes_only setting.

insight_type.title: Insight Type
insight_type.description: Type of insight to retrieve. One of: weekday, days, best_day, daily_average, projects, languages, editors, categories, machines, operating_systems.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a coding insight for the current user over a time range.

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_LEADERS
tools.description: Tool to list public leaders ranked by coding activity. Use when viewing top coders globally or filtering by language, country code, or hireable status.

inputSchema.title: WakatimeGetLeadersRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number to fetch; authenticated calls default to page containing current user

language.title: Language
language.description: Filter leaders by a specific language (e.g., 'python')

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: Filter leaders by a two-letter country code (e.g., 'US')

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing public leaders ranked by coding activity.

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_MACHINE_NAMES
tools.description: Tool to list a user's machines including last seen time. Use when needing machine names for a specific user.

inputSchema.title: WakatimeGetMachineNamesRequest

user.title: User
user.description: User identifier; use 'current' for the authenticated user.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing a user's machines.

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_OAUTH_AUTHORIZE
tools.description: Tool to generate OAuth 2.0 authorization URL. Use when redirecting users to WakaTime to grant access.

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: Space- or comma-separated list of scopes to request (e.g., 'read_stats write_data').

state.title: State
state.description: Opaque value to maintain state between request and callback; returned unchanged.

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: Your WakaTime App ID (found at wakatime.com/apps).

redirect_uri.title: Redirect Uri
redirect_uri.description: Redirect URI registered in your WakaTime app settings.

force_approve.title: Force Approve
force_approve.description: If provided, forces the user to re-approve (behavior may vary).

response_type.title: Response Type
response_type.description: Must be "code" for authorization-code flow or "token" for implicit flow.

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_PROJECTS
tools.description: Tool to list all projects associated with the authenticated user. Use when you need project slugs and metadata. Useful for fetching projects after obtaining a valid OAuth token.

inputSchema.title: WakatimeGetProjectsRequest

q.title: Q
q.description: Filter project names by a search term

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing projects of the current user.

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_USERS_ALL_TIME_SINCE_TODAY
tools.description: Tool to retrieve total coding time since account creation for a user. Use after authenticating to fetch all-time stats.

user.title: User
user.description: User path segment. Use 'current' for the authenticated user.

project.title: Project
project.description: Optional project name to filter totals

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_USERS_CURRENT_ALL_TIME_SINCE_TODAY
tools.description: Tool to get current user's total time logged since account creation. Use when you need lifetime aggregate stats for the authenticated user (requires read_stats scope).

project.title: Project
project.description: Optional project slug. If provided, returns total only for that project since its creation

tools.name: WAKATIME_GET_USERS_CURRENT_INSIGHTS
tools.description: Tool to fetch a coding insight for the current user over a time range. Use when needing project, language, or best_day metrics for a specific period. Requires OAuth scope `read_summaries`.

inputSchema.title: GetUsersCurrentInsightsRequest

range.title: Range
range.description: Time range specifier. Either a year (YYYY), a month (YYYY-MM), or one of: last_7_days, last_30_days, last_6_months, last_year, all_time.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Override keystroke timeout in minutes used to calculate stats; defaults to user's setting.

weekday.title: Weekday
weekday.description: Filter for 'days' insight: integer 0-6 or weekday name ('monday'-'sunday').

writes_only.title: Writes Only
writes_only.description: When true, include only write events (per user's writes_only setting).

inputSchema.description: Request model for fetching a coding insight for the current user over a time range.
